mapper.select: select u.username, u.hashed_password as hashedPassword, group_concat(distinct m.name) as menus, u.is_enabled as enabled, u.id as userId, u.nickname from user u join role r on u.role_id = r.id join role_menu rm on r.id = rm.role_id join menu m on m.id = rm.menu_id where u.username = #{username}
